C

cleanNonNumericCharacters(String) - Static method in class math.core.Notationer
Recieves a number as a String paramether, validates its back and front, and then removes every non numeric characters.

E

expandScientificNotation(StringBuilder) - Static method in class math.core.Notationer
Recieves a number as a StringBuilder paramether, validates it to make sure it is infact in scientific notation, if so it will return the number expanded, if not it will return itself.

F

format(String, String, boolean) - Static method in class math.core.Notationer
Recieves a number as two String paramethers, one representing the integer part and the other representing its decimal part and a boolean paramether that tells if the number uses decimal point notation.
formatIntegerPart(StringBuilder, String, char) - Static method in class math.core.Notationer

isNegative - Variable in class math.core.Digit

S

splitIntoIntegerAndDecimalParts(String) - Static method in class math.core.Notationer
Recieves a number as a String paramether, validates if it has a decimal part, if not it will fills it with empty to make sure it always return a 2 lenght String array.

T

THOUSANDS_SEPARATOR - Static variable in class math.core.Notationer
The char THOUSANDS_SEPARATOR with value ',' represents the thousands separator for the decimal point notation.
toString() - Method in class math.core.Digit
Implements the String format() function from extended class Notationer to print the number on a readable notation using the attributes this.integerPart, this.decimalPart and this.notation as paramethers for such function.
trimZeros(String) - Static method in class math.core.Notationer
Recieves a number as a String paramether, validates if it has a decimal point to extend the regrex statement to not trim the zeros at the end if it is not a decimal number.

V

validateAndNormalize(StringBuilder) - Static method in class math.core.Notationer
Recieves a number as a StringBuilder paramether, validates it to make sure it is infact a number and normalizes it to make readable in case it is not on a standard notation.
